title: NEAT Input
description: National Energy Audit Tool audit data input

audit.title: Audit Information
audit.$comment: The additionalProperties setting should limit any personally identifying information (PII) from the API

audit_id.title: Audit ID
audit_id.description: Required integer numeric identifier for the audit, mirrored in output, but otherwise unused in analysis

audit_number.title: Audit Number
audit_number.description: An optional supplemental integer numeric identifier requried for the audit record, also mirrored in output but otherwise not used in analysis

do_billing_adjust.title: Billing Adjustment
do_billing_adjust.description: Should run include utility billing adjustment

avg_no_occupants.title: The average number of occupants
avg_no_occupants.description: The average number of occupants in the dwelling

weather_location.title: Weather Station Selection
weather_location.description: Information on the weather station file to use

state.title: State Code
state.description: The two letter code for the state

file.title: File Name
file.description: Name of the weather file in the form xxxxxxxx.wx, Must match one of the 255 available files in the sys/weather path

walls.title: Walls
walls.description: The list of walls in the building shell

code.title: Wall Code
code.description: The short code for this Wall (must be unique for this job), no comma characters

stud_size.title: Stud Size
stud_size.description: The size of the studs used in the Wall construction

ext_type.title: Exterior Type
ext_type.description: The type of Wall exterior material

orient.title: Orientation
orient.description: The orientation of the line perpendicular to the wall

area.title: Gross Area (sq ft)
area.description: Gross area of the Wall including doors and windows (sq ft)

measure_number.title: Measure #
measure_number.description: Select the measure number to use

exist_insulation.title: Existing Insulation Type
exist_insulation.description: Type of existing Insulation in wall

exist_r.title: Existing Insulation R Value
exist_r.description: The R value of the existing Insulation

added_insulation.title: Added Insulation Type
added_insulation.description: Type of Insulation to be added to wall
added_insulation.$comment: Note that items 3 - 7 are for user defined insulation types

windows.title: Windows
windows.description: The list of windows in the building shell

code.title: Window Code
code.description: The short code for this window (must be unique for windows on each wall), no commas

int_shading.title: Interior Shading
int_shading.description: The type of interior shading for the window

leak.title: Leakiness
leak.description: General window and frame leakiness estimate

wall.title: Wall Code
wall.description: Select the Wall where this window is located

number.title: Number
number.description: Number of identical windows on this wall

inc_sir.title: Include in SIR
inc_sir.description: Include this window in overall Savings to Investment Ratio

cost_seal.title: Weatherization ($/window)
cost_seal.description: Additional per window cost to seal

cost_replace.title: Replacement ($/window)
cost_replace.description: Additional per window cost to replace

cost_low_e.title: Low E ($/window)
cost_low_e.description: Additional per window cost to replace with Low E

cost_add_storm.title: Storm ($/window)
cost_add_storm.description: Additional per window cost to add storm

doors.title: Doors
doors.description: The list of doors in the building shell

code.title: Door Code
code.description: The short code for this door (must be unique for doors on each wall), no commas

wall.title: Wall Code
wall.description: Select the Wall where this door is located

number.title: Number
number.description: Number of identical doors on this wall

inc_sir.title: Include in SIR
inc_sir.description: Include this door replacement in overall SIR
